sqlMap.update: CREATE TABLE billing_simple_tariff ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(200), rate DECIMAL, charge_unit INTEGER, time_unit VARCHAR, grace_period INTEGER, grace_period_charge DECIMAL, UNIQUE(name) );

CREATE TABLE billing_member ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(200), password VARCHAR(200), fullname VARCHAR(200), email VARCHAR(200), address VARCHAR(200), tariff_id INTEGER, autoconnect VARCHAR(10), credit DECIMAL, session_expiration_limit INTEGER, member_status VARCHAR(200), member_type VARCHAR(200), register_date DATETIME, UNIQUE(username), FOREIGN KEY (tariff_id) REFERENCES billing_simple_tariff(id) );

CREATE TABLE billing_session ( id INTEGER, member_id INTEGER, ip_address VARCHAR(200), start_time DATETIME, end_time DATETIME, last_visit DATETIME, expiration_limit INTEGER, charge DECIMAL, session_status VARCHAR(200), FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES billing_member(id) );
